Bingo Card Book Recommendations

Bingo Card All Books

Five SFF Short Stories

Bingo Square [18]

Any short story as long as there are five of them. HARD MODE: Read an entire SFF anthology or collection.

Title Author Hard Mode
A Metal Box Floating Between Stars and Other Stories Jamie Lackey
A Thousand Beginnings and Endings Ellen Oh
Accessing the Future Kathryn Allan and Djibril al-Ayad
Across the Spectrum Pati Nagle
Antisocieties Michael Cisco
Arcana Rhonda Parrish

Dark Waters Rhonda Parrish
Defying Doomsday Tsana Dolichva and Holly Kench
Dreams of Distant Shores Patricia McKillip
Dreams Underfoot Charles de Lint
Exhalation Ted Chian
Fae Rhonda Parrish
Far Out: Queer Science Fiction and Fantasy Paula Guran, ed.
Fire Robin McKinley and Peter Dickinson
Fragile Things Neil Gaiman
Full Throttle Joe Hill
G is for Ghosts Rhonda Parrish
Galactic North Alastair Reynolds
Grimm, Grit and Gasoline Rhonda Parrish
Harrowing the Dragon Patricia McKillip
Hear Me Roar Rhonda Parrish
Help Fund My Robot Army
Her Body and Other Parties Carmen Maria Machado
Her Smoke Rose Up Forever James Tiptree Jr.
Heroic Hearts Jim Butcher
Laughter at the Academy Seanan McGuire
Lost Lore: A Fantasy Anthology
Mrs. Claus: Not the Fairy Tale They Say Rhonda Parrish
Naked City Ellen Datlow

Tapping the Dream Tree Charles de Lint

The Egg & Other Stories Andy Weir

The New Dead
